ing: 1/2 cup spicy brown mustard (such as Gulden'sÂ®)
3 tablespoons red raspberry preserves (such as Smucker'sÂ®)
des: "An extraordinary dip for an ordinary pretzel.  The perfect combination. This is a clone of our favorite raspberry honey/mustard pretzel dip.  When the store was sold out of our favorite gourmet dip, Hubby and I decided to clone it."
ins: In a bowl, thoroughly combine the spicy brown mustard, honey, raspberry preserves, and mustard seeds. Serve in a dip bowl surrounded by pretzels. Store refrigerated. Dip will thicken when cold.
